shortcuts.description: You'll receive a short text along with a question to answer.

shortcuts.name: Learn words
shortcuts.description: You'll receive a word together with its definition, you then respond with a with a sentence using that word.

shortcuts.name: Rewrite texts
shortcuts.description: You can let the LLM rewrite a text into German at your proficiency level.

shortcuts.name: Practise conversations
shortcuts.description: A short conversation will be simulated, for example about ordering food or discussing a hobby.

shortcuts.name: Write a story
shortcuts.description: You'll take turns writing a story piece by piece.

shortcuts.name: Ask for clarification
shortcuts.description: Get explanations about German, such as a grammar rule like conjugations or cases.
